definition: to conceal/to hide away/to harbor/to store/to collect

sentences.english: Our country is rich in natural resource, we have many mineral deposits.
sentences.chinese: 我們國家擁有豐富的自然資源，有很多礦藏分佈。
四川各種礦藏蘊量豐富。

sentences.english: The prospecting team traversed far and wide in search of mineral deposits.
sentences.chinese: 地質勘探隊爲尋找礦藏而走遍四面八方。

sentences.english: The droid's mineral sensors have been replaced with laser cannons.
sentences.chinese: 這種機器人的礦藏傳感器被激光炮所取代。

sentences.english: There was uranium in sufficient quantity to make mining economic.
sentences.chinese: 鈾的礦藏量豐富，值得進行開採。

sentences.english: Among the mineral deposits of the province, tin occupies first place; copper comes second.
sentences.chinese: 該省礦藏，以錫最多，銅次之。

sentences.english: There is a sylvine deposit in Yunnan Province of China.
sentences.chinese: 我國雲南有一個鉀石鹽礦藏。

sentences.english: We develop the natural resources of our country by searching for minerals.
sentences.chinese: 我們通過尋找礦藏來開發我國的自然資源。

sentences.english: The ageing body is like a field self-sown with mines.
sentences.chinese: 衰老的身體正如一塊自我孕育了礦藏的土地。

sentences.english: Our country is rich in naturing resources. We haudio-videoe many minering deposits.
sentences.chinese: 我們國度具有富厚的天然資源，有很多的礦藏散佈。

sentences.english: Xixia county lies Funiu mountain, there is plenty of resource of graphite.
sentences.chinese: 西峽縣地處伏牛山區，石墨礦藏資源十分豐富。

sentences.english: The surveying team went to remote regions of our country in search of mineral resources.
sentences.chinese: 這個勘察隊到我國遙遠的地區去尋找礦藏。

sentences.english: After innumerable hardships, the prospecting team discovered a lot of new ores.
sentences.chinese: 地質勘探隊員們歷盡千辛萬苦，找到了不少新礦藏。

sentences.english: The mine was discovered in 1955 and is over 600 meters deep.
sentences.chinese: 該礦藏於1955年被發現，深600多米。

sentences.english: Underground, a wealth of minerals provides a solid base for American industry.
sentences.chinese: 豐富的地下礦藏是美國工業的堅實基礎。

sentences.english: He had prospected for minerals everywhere from the Gobi Desert to the Transvaal.
sentences.chinese: 他已在從戈壁沙漠到德蘭士瓦的無數地方勘探過礦藏。

definition: remaining quantity/reserves (of natural resources, oil etc)
